title: Brandon Woodruff /// Part 2 /// 436
description:
Brandon Woodruff /// Part 2 /// 436

Part 2 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

In October of 2005 college freshman Brandon Woodruff was arrested for the murders of his parents. Someone killed Dennis and Norma Woodruff in their new home. Questionable tactics have many asking was this Texas Justice or an Injustice?

Beer of the Week - Bigtoberfest by The BIG brewing companyGarage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps
